Summon Danavas

EA Lanka,  MA Bandar Log,  LA Patala

Ritual

spell id [id]: 444

Summon Units:#1767 Danava x 3
Danavas are demon titans of ancient times. After the great wars with the Devatas of Kailasa, they were banished to the Nether Realms, where they made themselves kings. With this ritual they can be summoned to serve a new God on its path to ascendancy.
